sBuffer_t Struct Reference

#include <VLIB_tiler.h>

Detailed Description

Container which holds a buffer pointer and its associated memory layout information for each buffer used in functions which end in "_tile".

Parameters:
data Pointer to the data buffer
rows Number of rows in the buffer
cols Number of columns in the buffer
pitch Number of elements between the start of each row in the buffer
flags Contains information about tile type, channel number, and continous flag (can be independently set and retreived using macros)

Definition at line 176 of file VLIB_tiler.h.
